_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Astro Colony
author: limmek@swedon.se
description: Explore endless Universe and create the most efficient constellation of colonies. Build conveyor systems to automate production. Take care of Astronauts and their needs! Establish new colonies as part of intergalactic simulation.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:debian'

##
#
# Variables
# STEAM_USER, STEAM_PASS, STEAM_AUTH - Steam user setup. If a user has 2fa enabled it will most likely fail due to timeout. Leave blank for anon install.
# WINDOWS_INSTALL - if it's a windows server you want to install set to 1
# SRCDS_APPID - steam app id found here - https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List
# SRCDS_BETAID - beta branch of a steam app. Leave blank to install normal branch
# SRCDS_BETAPASS - password for a beta branch should one be required during private or closed testing phases.. Leave blank for no password.
# INSTALL_FLAGS - Any additional SteamCMD  flags to pass during install.. Keep in mind that steamcmd auto update process in the docker image might overwrite or ignore these when it performs update on server boot.
# AUTO_UPDATE - Adding this variable to the egg allows disabling or enabling automated updates on boot. Boolean value. 0 to disable and 1 to enable.
#
 ##

# Install packages. Default packages below are not required if using our existing install image thus speeding up the install process.
#apt -y update
#apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc-s1 ca-certificates tar unzip lib32gcc-s1 wget

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAPASS} ]] || printf %s "-betapassword ${SRCDS_BETAPASS}" ) ${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## add below your custom commands if needed

# We need to get the server download url from the official Linux installation script until it's released on steam.
# For now there is only windows executable.
# Steam APP id: 2662210
# https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FuriosIra/AstroColonyServerScript/main/InstallAstroColonyLinuxServer.sh
if [[ "${AUTO_UPDATE}" == 1 || ! -f "AstroColonyLinuxServer.zip" ]]; then
    cd /mnt/server
    wget -q --no-check-certificate -O "InstallAstroColonyLinuxServer.sh" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FuriosIra/AstroColonyServerScript/main/InstallAstroColonyLinuxServer.sh"
    serverFoldersLink=$(grep -o 'serverFoldersLink="[^"]*' "InstallAstroColonyLinuxServer.sh" | sed 's/serverFoldersLink="//')
    eval "serverFoldersLink=\"$serverFoldersLink\""
    wget --load-cookies /tmp/cookies.txt "$serverFoldersLink" -O AstroColonyLinuxServer.zip && rm -rf /tmp/cookies.txt
    unzip -o AstroColonyLinuxServer.zip
    chmod +x LinuxServer/AstroColonyServer.sh
    # add steamclient.so to Astro Colony otherwise it wont display on serverlist
    cp -v linux64/steamclient.so LinuxServer/AstroColony/Binaries/Linux/steamclient.so
fi

## set up settings
create_server_settings_ini() {
    cat > ServerSettings.ini <<EOF
[/Script/AstroColony.EHServerSubsystem]
ServerPassword=${SERVER_PASSWORD}
Seed=${SERVER_MAPSEED}
MapName=${SERVER_MAPNAME}
MaxPlayers=${SERVER_MAXPLAYERS}
ShouldLoadLatestSavegame=${SERVER_LOADLATESTSAVEGAME}
AdminList=${SERVER_ADMINS} 
SharedTechnologies=${SERVER_SHAREDTECHNOLOGIES}
OxygenConsumption=${SERVER_OXYGENCONSUMPTION}
FreeConstruction=${SERVER_FREECONSTRUCTION}
AutosaveInterval=${SERVER_AUTOSAVEINTERVAL}
AutosavesCount=${SERVER_AUTOSAVESCOUNT}
EOF
}

mkdir -p LinuxServer/AstroColony/Saved/Config/LinuxServer
cd LinuxServer/AstroColony/Saved/Config/LinuxServer
create_server_settings_ini

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: [Advanced] Steam App ID
variables.description: For now there is no linux version available on steam to download so we need to use app id 1007 instead and download the server from external source. As soon there is a version available we can use the Astro Colony Dedicated Server: 2662210 instead.

variables.name: Server Query Port
variables.description: UDP port for Steam server list features.

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: Set the game password. Leave empty to make server public.

variables.name: Map Name
variables.description: Set the name of the save file.

variables.name: Autosaves Count
variables.description: How many auto save files to keep.

variables.name: Admin List
variables.description: List of server administrators only (steamID64s) allowed, separatet by comma.

variables.name: Auto Update
variables.description: Disabling or enabling automated updates on boot
